snippet.title: Conarium - Console Launch Trailer (PS4 & XBOX ONE)
snippet.description:
Conarium is Out Now on Consoles and PC.
Steam: http://store.steampowered.com//app/313780
Playstation US: https://store.playstation.com/?resolve=UP3797-CUSA14099_00-CONARIUM10037XXX
Playstation EU: https://store.playstation.com/?resolve=EP3652-CUSA12427_00-CONARIUM10037XXX
Xbox: https://www.microsoft.com/p/conarium/c1vp5vmb1rc6 

Conarium is a chilling Lovecraftian game, which follows a gripping story involving four scientists and their endeavor to challenge what we normally consider to be the ‘absolute’ limits of nature. Inspired by H.P. Lovecraft’s novella "At the Mountains of Madness", but largely set after the original story.

Official website: http://www.conariumgame.com

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/conariumgame

Twitter: http://twitter.com/conariumgame / http://twitter.com/Iceberg_Int #Conarium

Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/conarium

Steam Publisher Page: http://bit.ly/IcebergOnSteam

Stay up to date with Iceberg Interactive! Sign up for our newsletter here: http://eepurl.com/cXFsK9
